name: AlignmentObject
description: An intangible item that describes an alignment between a learning resource and a node in an educational framework.
title: AlignmentObject

fields.name: targetDescription
fields.title: targetDescription
fields.description: The description of a node in an established educational framework.

fields.name: alignmentType
fields.title: alignmentType
fields.description: A category of alignment between the learning resource and the framework node. Recommended values include: 'assesses', 'teaches', 'requires', 'textComplexity', 'readingLevel', 'educationalSubject', and 'educationalLevel'.

fields.name: targetUrl
fields.title: targetUrl
fields.description: The URL of a node in an established educational framework.

fields.name: targetName
fields.title: targetName
fields.description: The name of a node in an established educational framework.

fields.name: educationalFramework
fields.title: educationalFramework
fields.description: The framework to which the resource being described is aligned.
